entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 04:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -34.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
